alert.note: Alert for Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 7:05PM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Above Philadelphia. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Water begins to affect Burnside Lake Water Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM CST Sunday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 13.5 feet early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Philadelphi 13.0 12.6 Sun 5 pm CST 12.9 13.4 13.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 915 AM CST.
